#include <iostream>
#include <list>

using namespace std;

int main() {

long long t, n,input, i = 0,prev=0,counter = 0;

list <long long> a;

cin >> t;

while(t--)
{
    cin >> n;
    counter = -1;
    for(i = 0; i < n; i++) 
    {
        cin >> input;
        if( counter == -1  || ((counter == 1 && input > a.back()) || (counter==0 && input<a.back())))
        {
            a.push_back(input);
        }
        else
        {
            prev = a.back();
            a.pop_back();
            a.push_back(input);
            a.push_back(prev);
        }

        if(counter == -1 || counter == 0) counter = 1; else counter = 0;
    }

    for(i = 0; i < n; i++) {cout << a.front() << " "; a.pop_front();}
    cout<<endl;

}
}
